    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1040</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weather Report</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter-Report</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivez à à l'état</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relatório Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto Del Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καιρική έκθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Informe Del Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Before you take a 'virtual trip', check the weather report</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weather forecast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weather report travel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bevor Sie eine ' virtuelle Reise ' nehmen, 
überprüfen Sie den Wetterreport</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avant que vous prenniez 'un voyage virtuel ', 
contrôlez l'état de survivre à</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Antes que você faça exame ' de um desengate 
virtual ', verifique o relatório do tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prima che prendiate 'un viaggio virtuale ', 
controlli il rapporto del tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προτού να πάρετε ένα "εικονικό ταξίδι", ελέγξτε την 
καιρική έκθεση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Antes de que usted tome un ' viaje virtual ', 
controle el informe del tiempo</string>
          </description>
